original: Savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: sa vitakkam dhammam paṭicca na sa vitakkaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: avitakkam dhammam paṭicca na avitakkaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava

original: Savicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca na sa vicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Avicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: avicāram dhammam paṭicca na avicāraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava
